scripts.test: . scripts/bonus-compile.sh && node scripts/bonus-bump-solidity.js && npx hardhat test
scripts.test:less-than-10: node scripts/bump-solidity-less-than-10.js && npx hardhat test --grep LessThan10
scripts.test:range-proof: node scripts/bump-solidity-range-proof.js && npx hardhat test --grep RangeProof
scripts.test:bonus: node scripts/bonus-bump-solidity.js && npx hardhat test --grep SystemOfEquations
